title: 95/270/EC: Commission Decision of 30 June 1995 amending Decision 94/360/EC on the reduced frequency of physical checks of consignments of certain products to be imported from third countries
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 30 June 1995 amending Decision  94/360/EC on the reduced frequency of physical checks of consignments of certain products to be  imported from third countries (Text with EEA relevance) (95/270/EC)
THE COMMISSION  OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Commission Decision 94/360/EC shall be amended as follows:
-  In Article 3 (1), the date of '1 May 1995` is replaced by '1 December 1995`,
-  In Article 3 (3), the date of '1 July 1995` is replaced by '1 February 1996`,
-  In Article 7, the date of '1 July 1995` is replaced by '1  February 1996`.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 June 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
